Leptis Magna.title: Leptis Magna
Leptis Magna.byline: Leptis Magna, also spelled Lepcis Magna, is a UNESCO World Heritage Site on the Mediterranean coast of North Africa in the Tripolitania region of Libya.

Leppävirta.title: Leppävirta
Leppävirta.byline: Leppävirta is a municipality in North Savonia, Finland.
